resources.string: "Program files could not be found. Check the dalvik cache location to solve the problem. Default location: /data/dalvik-cache/*"
Thanks for the English translation: ChelpuS, Ms_Julia, p0izn@xda

Lucky Patcher is a universal patching tool that is designed to modify applications. It has the ability to remove ads, remove Google license verification (automatically and manually), manage app permissions and do much more.
"The app's activity is used for advertising."
Show all apps with Google ads.
All changes have been fixed in the .odex file and will persist until the application is reinstalled.
APK file could not be found.
App could not be found. Please install the application and try again.
The app has no data. There is nothing to backup.
Something went wrong. The backup appears incomplete or corrupted.
Do you really want to delete the backup?
No backup files were found in:
Do you want to try and get this item for free?
To disable auto repeat, select the app and go to Tools > Remove selected saved purchases and delete the items.

"For the best results, you must use a patch to Android with 'Signature verification status: true' To disable the hack, go to Switches at the bottom of Lucky Patcher and choose Disable Google billing emulation."
"Requires 'Support patch for in-app and LVL' to target application and applied Patch to Android. Use custom patch for Google Play for correct purchase information and price within the application."
Send a reply to the application unsigned (this may work for unrooted users)
Do you want to remove this directory bind?
Binding failed. Data directory could not be found.
WARNING: BusyBox could not be found. Lucky Patcher cannot function without BusyBox.
"You can change Lucky Patcher's icon in your launcher."
Create data and cache backups for installation.
Clone application (May not work for all applications)
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
APK with modified permissions and activities
"Disable components 'pm disable' method (May be re-enabled by the application)"
Try to hide Lucky Patcher from other apps. Not recommended, use only if required.
Move selected apps to internal storage
Move selected apps to SD card
"Change permissions and activities Rebuild and install"
"Change permissions and activities Save original signature (Safe method)"
Support patch for in-app and LVL emulation
Remove http links using AdsBlockList_user_edit.txt and AdsBlockList.txt files.
"Patch on reboot (Unstable - only for patching libs)"
Necessary for In-app, LVL and keygen emulations. Required for correct verification of purchases and licenses.

Allows the modification of an application without touching the original signature. Other users can install this APK only after applying a patch to the Android Core (useful for translating, modifying graphics and etc. in protected applications).
Disable signature verification in the package manager
Allows the installation of applications with different signatures on top of each other.
Allows the installations of applications with older versions than ones that are already installed.
Support patch for in-app and LVL emulation
Other patches which can be useful for removing ads.
There are a few differences from \"Auto Mode\". It might help you if \"Auto Mode\" was unsuccessful.
Additional patches that may cause instability. Apply only if other patterns were unsuccessful. Requires internet. Try to use together with \"Auto Mode\" or \"Auto Mode (Inversed)\".
This does not work for all applications. If the clone is not installed, you will need to remove the original. If this does not work, try creating a clone using another method.
This does not work for all applications. This attempts to change the resources and classes.dex file. Such a clone would make it isolated from the original.
Custom patch is not available for this version of the program, or the program has already been patched.
Not all patterns are replaced, but the program can still work. Test it!
%1$s has successfully been signed by a test signature. Resigned file is located in %2$s.
Your Lucky Patcher has been modified. You cannot send logs.
Please update Lucky Patcher to the latest version to send logs.
Lucky Patcher must be installed to internal memory, not your SD card. Otherwise, some features may not work properly.
"Could not create the file join_patch.txt. You may not have write permissions to the patch folder."
"Could not delete the file join_patch.txt. Delete the file or patch folder manually."
Could not get classes.dex file for patching.
Lucky Patcher cannot import the custom patch. The zip archive appears to be damaged.
Google Play has been installed. Now, code.jar will be patched and your device will reboot. Continue?
There was an error creating a log.
"Create log file for conscrypt.jar ('Patch to Android')"
"Create log file for core-libart.jar ('Patch to Android')"
"Create log file for services.jar ('Patch to Android')"
"Log has been created and is stored in /sdcard/conscrypt.oat.txt. Save the file to a cloud service or create a compressed zip file. Email it to me at lp.chelpus@gmail.com. File size:"
"Log has been created and is stored in /sdcard/boot.oat.txt. Save the file to a cloud service or create a compressed zip file. Email it to me at lp.chelpus@gmail.com. File size:"
"Log has been created and is stored in /sdcard/service.odex.txt. Save the file to a cloud service or create a compressed zip file. Email it to me at lp.chelpus@gmail.com. File size:"

"% Luck! Please run this application to test the patch!
If the application doesn't work, please reinstall it and do not try to patch this version of it."
Lucky Patcher imported these custom patches and files.
Do you really want to delete %1$s and install the selected application version?
Please select one or more custom patches.
Remove ads from About and Changelog.
"Google Play Protect often defines Lucky Patcher as a harmful app, but it isn't. To remove these warnings, go to Play Store > Play Protect > Disable 'Scan device for security threats'."
"Many websites share fake Lucky Patcher apps. We would like you to share our official download link on your blog or YouTube videos. Official download link: https://www.luckypatchers.com/download/"
If you press back, Lucky Patcher will ask for confirmation to exit the app.
Lucky Patcher transferred settings from an older version.
"Disable option 'mount namespace separation' in SuperSU/root app. (Will reboot.)"
Do you really want to uninstall this app?
Imported archive contains an APK file. Do you want to install %1$s with version %2$s and build %3$s?
Lucky Patcher has crashed. Please update Lucky Patcher to the latest version.
Your firmware has a jex optimisation. Firmware patch is not possible. Change your firmware or upgrade to Android 5+.
A browser on this device could not be found to open the web link.

"Lucky Patcher has modified the package name. However, there are some errors. If you use the 'Support patch for in-app emulation' patch, you will have to apply the patch again to the target applications. If you have rebuilt applications using the patch, you will need to rebuild the original applications again using the latest Lucky Patcher."

"The package name was not modified correctly. If you use the 'Support patch for in-app emulation' patch, the patch cannot be applied to applications. When applications are rebuilt using this patch, there will be errors."
